platform.title: SARS-CoV-2 ENA Submission
platform.summary: Galaxy Docker image for submitting SARS-CoV-2 data to ENA
comments: ELIXIR Belgium has developed a Galaxy tool for submission of SARS-Cov-2 genetic sequences and associated metadata to the [European Nucleotide Archive (ENA)](https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ena/browser/home)
